Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Northbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Elston
ShortDescription: Northbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Chicago, Noble, Augusta and Milwaukee due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Chicago, Noble, Augusta and Milwaukee due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Elston.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #106 East 103rd Temporary Reroute at at 103rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, King Drive, 107th, Cottage Grove and 103rd: due to, street blockage near 103rd/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#106 East 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, King Drive, 107th, Cottage Grove and 103rd: due to, street blockage near 103rd/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Oak Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Oak Park due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
